title: Tell me Keyru, how does one become a "Player behavior specialist"?
body:
https://i.imgur.com/5wpZWVB.gifv

http://i.imgur.com/Vwu0Q5t.png

http://i.imgur.com/crzqd4U.png

http://i.imgur.com/uA1ra7X.png

http://i.imgur.com/XL9hjX5.png?1

http://i.imgur.com/GEIMR0E.jpg?1

How many years of tutelage,harsh rigorous training and blistering winds under Dr. Lyte must I endure to become like you? Teach me your ways senpai. I wish to become more than a mere mortal.

Here some extra photos. Shown below is one of the forum moderators leaving up a thread for which I was banned for a solid 20 minutes after issuing said ban. Noticing they screwed up, another mod (or same one) re-issued ban to save face. Actually I would have rather had the 7-day ban I was originally issued if it meant they had actual accountability.

http://i.imgur.com/QdRNrka.png

http://i.imgur.com/aOpjRap.png

http://i.imgur.com/zlfi1rw.png

An example of how it SHOULD be done.

http://i.imgur.com/HJbicei.png

Yes Keyru fanboys, your down-votes sustain me. They fuel my drive. Thank you for your continued support in these hard times :^)
